title: rby
author: rby
content: Who is Ratimov?Is he the Hero of bitcointalk?While theymos is the Owner.How did he even know I was stocked and needed merits to upgrade my rank?I did not even write him a private message.How did he notice me among thousands of other people?While someone who I wrote told me that I do not have one post worthy to be given 1 merit. Today Ratimov has given me sense of belonging. Thank you my bitcointalk Hero for making me a hero member.Best manager of bitcointalk Hhampuz, I am now a hero member.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Congratulations on reaching onto the next level! Now your goal is to be Legendary. For sure Ratimov reads a lot here in the forum and checks who the poster is and if it’s near to ranking up, maybe he just does it and goes with it. The sense of belonging to become a Hero Member is with you. Congratulations again

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Some members which are mostly merit source on this forum can do something like that, Ratimov is still one of the merit sources we have on this forum. Merit source like to merit someone that is close to rank up which is what that just happened. You are now a hero now, congratulations, legendary next.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Ratimov has a thread to help members that has few merit required to rank up on his thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5345240.msg61846838#msg61846838. They are scraping data of the forum and sort all the members merit he basically watching all of our progress. He is so good on creating useful thread to help the forum.Congratulations to your rank up.

comments.author: rby
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on March 03, 2023, 11:54:53 AMCongratulations on reaching onto the next level! Now your goal is to be Legendary. Quote from: _act_ on March 03, 2023, 11:57:13 AM You are now a hero now, congratulations, legendary next.Thank you, I accept your congratulations but I don't think I can become a legendary rank member because I do not recieve merits quickly because I love to post in gambling discussion and merits don't fall there.I am happy with this Hero.Quote from: Beparanf on March 03, 2023, 12:09:33 PMRatimov has a thread to help members that has few merit required to rank up on his thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5345240.msg61846838#msg61846838. They are scraping data of the forum and sort all the members merit he basically watching all of our progress. He is so good on creating useful thread to help the forum.Congratulations to your rank up.Oh! I have seen thank you so much.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: He might use this thread Bitcointalk Ranking-up pipeline- Those close to their next rank (lacking Merits)  to know which users are lack of merit to rank up. Ratimov is already a Legendary, not Hero anymore.However I don't understand why you need to mention Hhampuz here lol, you should contact him via private message or directly post in the thread of your signature campaign.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: congrats on your new rank.Ratimov did an amazing job today. distribute 587 sMerit to several members and help them rank up instantly.Of course, Ratimov had thought about it, it wouldn't be like throwing sMerit in the trash. he certainly saw those who deserved to move up the ranks.OP, you are one of the lucky ones. congrats .

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on March 03, 2023, 12:53:27 PMHe might use this thread Bitcointalk Ranking-up pipeline- Those close to their next rank (lacking Merits)  to know which users are lack of merit to rank up.Another thread is [self-moderated] Report unmerited good posts to Merit Source that is kind of a dead topic recent months.You can announce your cool feeling by ranking up to Hero member in Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!Congrats and your journey has yet stopped, you are only half of it, Legendary member rank is waiting

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Congratulations, but the way you present it indicates that you are trying to attack Ratimov.Instead of creating a topic you can share your achievements here ----> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391471.0And I hope that you will continue to create high-quality posts to see you as a legendary member in a short period.

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Quote from: rby on March 03, 2023, 11:27:02 AMWho is Ratimov?Is he the Hero of bitcointalk?A sort of --but you deserved his generosity. You are very lucky that you got their attention to pour merit, it is also the same on [The Sceptical Chymist] and even [DdmrDdmr], merit source like them seems an angel that falls from the heaven to those who need it. Look at their profile, you will be amazed someone ranked up because of their generosity and that is because they review your post history and you are deserved what you have got. Just distribute it very well in return for their generosity. Congratulation by the way.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Congratulations @rby Promoted to Hero member Rank.Ratimov gave you today 50 merits . Hence You have been promoted to Hero Member status today for Ratimov to give you 50 Merits. Even though you did not send a personal message to @Ratimov, you have been awarded 50 merits. @Ratimov always keeps up with active members on the forum and gives them merits if they need some merit to advance to the next rank. In this case, there is no need to give a personal message to Ratimov.Here @Ratimov's Helping thread for potential members/full member/sr member/Hero member/legendary memberHelping Potential Legendary, Hero, Senior and Full Members (March 2023 Upd)March update 2023Quote from: Ratimov on March 03, 2023, 10:03:30 AMNew round of merit distribution in 2023- Ulven - Congratulations on your Legendary rank- Unsoldier - Congratulations on your Legendary rank- rdluffy - Congratulations on your Legendary rank- geophphreigh - Congratulations on your Legendary rank- Luzin - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- UserU - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- Phoenix Anka - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- Mauser - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- CryptoHeadlineNews - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- Wexnident - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- Sandra_hakeem - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- Davian144 - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- rby - Congratulations on your Hero Member rank- m.lov - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- Domchi - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- Review Master - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- Cryptogreatdane - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- HedgeFx - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- Queentoshi - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- stoos - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- Zaguru12 - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- EarnOnVictor - Congratulations on your new Sr. Member rank- bonfire66 - Congratulations on your new Full Member rank- The_Crypto_Kid - Congratulations on your new Full Member rank

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Don't forget to say something for @Ratimov, which may make him revisit your thread in the future, he has a unique behavior here, especially for members who want to go to the next level, as far as I know, many have the same fate as you here, for the behavior carried out by @Ratimov.What's clear, he's a good member here and he often makes surprises that the other members don't expect, overall many members fly to the next rank because of his generosity to give sMerit to the members here. I hope you become an inspiration and motivation to be even better in the future for the ranking (Hero) you have now.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: It's time to get used to the fact that Ratimov is a local Santa. He does not necessarily distribute gifts on the New Year; now it happens in the first days of spring. I doubt that Ratimov has some unique abilities to cover all the information on the forum; I think it's not worth it. It is enough to check the number of his reports to make sure that he is always present on the forum.OP, I also join in the congratulations; it's always nice to see such humble heroes who are here on the forum not only for the sake of rank increases but also for their own interests.My respect.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: Everyone has their own version of what a merit-worthy post should be. If one person doesn’t like your post or your style of posting, others just may appreciate it. It seems Ratimov was on a merits spree today and you’re one of the lucky beneficiaries. It’s not surprising to me, accounts from my era are very familiar with Ratimov’s generosity, we have all been received merits to rank up at one point or the other. He’s been a part of our journey, little wonder why he’s so popular in the awards. Congratulations OP!

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: rby on March 03, 2023, 11:27:02 AMHow did he even know I was stocked and needed merits to upgrade my rank?There's a thread created by Ddmrddmr on members having few merits to their next rank https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5206035.400 otherwise known as ranking up pipeline, he update that on a regular basis, any member or merit source willing to help and assist committed memvers of the forum rank up to their bext rabk can easily pick up from that thread list, we also have the one he himself Ratimov have created https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5345240.120 whereby he can also pick members from there, lastly there are ither threads that helps memvers got nominated for quality posting without but lacking merits by LoyceV https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5093271.0 so there are many threads whereby your name can be suggested or you can also post for review of your profile for ranking up, lastly, congratulations to you on your new rank.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: He is an active contributor of bitcointalk community even he gave me most number of merits from all my merits earned as per https://bpip.org/Profile?p=Findingnemo so it shows he encourages everyone who is contributing something to the forum and he may noticed you were lacking 50 merits to next rank but deserved to reach so he poured you what he can.Gambling board isn't a place where much merits were distributed but surely there will be rewards for worthy posts in any board no matter what so don't keep yourself low and keep moving your next goal which is legendary.

comments.author: skarais
comments.body: Quote from: rby on March 03, 2023, 12:19:02 PMI don't think I can become a legendary rank member because I do not recieve merits quickly because I love to post in gambling discussion and merits don't fall there.You can always earn merit on any board as long as you have high quality posts. Even if not many merit sources are present there, but if you feel your post deserves to be reviewed by merit sources especially for its quality, then report them in this thread:[self-moderated] Report unmerited good posts to Merit SourceAfter all, you are not required to post everything on the gambling board by the terms of the campaign, so share more of your posts on the board you think are better and have the highest potential for merit.On your success in ranking up, I also congratulate you.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: This isn't the first time Ratimov has helped users so close to his rank, I'm sure you are not the last user it will help. As I know, Ratimov has sent 24,173 sMerits to 1978 users and hence he has been named the 9th most generous merit source so far.I'm not surprised by your progress, but new chapter has started for you. Congratulations, you have become a Hero member.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Wow , there are 24 members who go up the ranking simultaneously thanks to Ratimov who helps you go up to each of them, he is a good contribution of merit that can help many other users.So far your efforts how to post in good quality so that Ratimov sees you who deserve merit and yes we know that Ratimov always gives this unexpectedly or gives not giving any instructions.But congratulations to all of you.

comments.author: NicNacCoin
comments.body: @rby sir thank you  After a lot of hard work you have received your Hero Member rank. But I think you have to work hard to get this position. This is not the end, you have to go further, work hard and take the highest rank.a And @Ratimov sir is a hardworking and honest person. Today this forum is running with a lot of reputation because of ethical people like them. I thank @Ratimov sir. And thank you again @rby sir.
